long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color Ninja — Color Picker Chrome Extension 🎨

Seamless and efficient color picking. Designed for designers, developers, and color enthusiasts, Color Ninja is lightweight, fast, and incredibly easy to use.

Key Features:

1. Seamless Color Picking:

Use our built-in eye dropper tool to pick colors directly from images or any visual content on your screen. 🖌️

2. Simple and Intuitive:

User-Friendly Interface: A clean and straightforward interface ensures that picking and saving colors is a breeze. 👍
One-Click Functionality: Grab any color with a single click and have it ready for use. ✔️

 3. Fast and Efficient:
Works instantly, so you don’t waste time. ⏱️ 
Lightweight: Minimalistic design ensures it’s easy on your device’s resources. 🌱

4. Convenient Hotkeys:
Hotkey Support: Quickly pick colors using Ctrl+C when extension is open. No need to navigate menus—just press and pick. ⌨️

5. Save and Organize:
Save Color Sets: Save and organize your favorite color sets easily. Ideal for managing project palettes. 📂

Copy to Clipboard: Copy the color code with a single click and use it anywhere. 📋
Why Choose Hello Color?



Add Color Ninja now and enhance your color picking workflow. Efficient, simple, and fast—experience the best color picker tool available for Google Chrome.
